We make it simpler to learn about your child’s development and do something about it.

Our Story

I had three kids under the age of five and wanted to learn what child development experts knew. I was short on time and needed quick reads. No excess. Just the important stuff. But I also wanted real answers from real experts. Things that I could use at home. I searched high and low for this Holy Grail website; I couldn’t find it. So I built it.

 

When I started working with teachers at my children’s preschool, I saw how magical they were….local heroes who knew how to navigate any child in any situation because they understood the science of how children learned. I wanted to learn from them to be a better parent. So I asked them to answer my long list of questions. And that’s how Plinkit was born.

 

As my kids grow, I’ll have more questions. You’ll have more questions. Let’s find the answers together.

Charmaine

P.S. – Got questions? Send them my way.

Answers from the Brightest

Good thing I had smart teacher friends. I asked them to write answers to my questions. Then I asked them to write answers to my friends’ questions. The questions snowballed. And soon they asked their smart teacher friends to join the bandwagon.

 

Before we knew it, we had childhood experts from San Francisco’s leading preschools, teachers with over twenty years of classroom experience, education consultants and experts with Master degrees. And then we found savvy user-experience designers to translate all that brilliance into something you would actually use.

 

Not shy about it – it’s a rock star team. Real teachers, real practitioners, real doers.

 

Want to write for us? Here’s how.

How we redefined learning better and playing smarter *with* your kids

Back to Basics

We categorized things according to five basic child development skills. Every child uses these skills. Every parent and teacher wants to know how to strengthen them.

Critical Thinking: Problem solving, thinking outside-the-box and asking questions. Categorizing, seeing patterns and themes and strengthening memory.

Social + Emotional: Building a diverse emotional vocabulary to promote self-awareness, self-control and self-expression. Finding solutions to social challenges.

Language + Literacy: Learning to express oneself and to communicate with others. Introducing robust vocabulary, making word-play fun and instilling a love for reading.

Creativity + Imagination: Making sense of the world and exploring possibility. Discovering new abilities and interests, practicing social skills, trying out diverse roles and working through questions and feelings.

Fine Motor + Gross Motor: Improving dexterity, physical control and spatial awareness. Developing attention and focus.

All You Need in One Place

Life needs to be simpler. Information needs to be efficient and useful. So we streamlined things for you.

Learn + Do: Child development fundamentals paired with simple activities you can do - immediately. Written by early childhood experts.

Shop + Play: We take the guesswork out of buying toys that are educational and fun. Expertly sourced. Better and fewer.

What is a Plinkit Anyway?

“It’s that awesome sound in my brain when I learn something and drop a marble into my Marble Jar!” Mind blown. Sage words from my 3-year old.

A Plinkit is that feel-good connection between what we learn and what we do. That spark that goes off in our brains when something makes sense. So as you journey through childhood and life with your child, keep learning, keep doing, keep playing – and then Plinkit those kernels of wisdom into your own Marble Jar. As my kids grow, my jar (and my heart) get fuller.

Start filling your jar today.

Since You're Here...

… We pride ourselves on stellar original content at Plinkit. But it takes *a lot* of time, money and hard work to produce this content. We do it because we believe it serves a real need – and we think you feel the same way too. But unlike many other organizations, we don’t have any advertisements or sponsored recommendations. So you can see why in order to support Plinkit, we participate in affiliate partnerships. We editorially select everything on Plinkit and are extremely picky. Shopping from our independently chosen partners helps to support what we do. You don’t have to, but if you do, “A million thanks! We really, really appreciate it.”
